sentences.en: A Congressman should echo the opinions of his constituency.
sentences.cn: 国会议员应该向议会反映该区选民的意见.

sentences.en: A constituency there trusts only sober officials.
sentences.cn: 那里的选民只信任不贪杯的官员.

sentences.en: Are you satisfied with the election results of your constituency?
sentences.cn: 你满唔满意自己所属选区既选举结果?

sentences.en: At the same time, the magazine was giving the message to a quite different constituency.
sentences.cn: 同时, 这家杂志还向形形色色的选民发布新闻.

sentences.en: China as a single constituency, is also one XI.
sentences.cn: 中国为单独选区, 亦有一席.

sentences.en: Each constituency elects one member of the House of Commons.
sentences.cn: 每个选区选举一名下议院成员.

sentences.en: Electors may vote only in the constituency in which they are registered.
sentences.cn: 选民只可在所属的登记选区投票.

sentences.en: He has been selected as a candidate for a northern constituency.
sentences.cn: 他被挑选为北部选区的候选人.

sentences.en: He represents the Essex constituency of Epping Forest.
sentences.cn: 他代表埃平森林区的埃塞克斯郡选区。

sentences.en: I am a registered elector for a the geographical constituency.
sentences.cn: 本人已登记为地方选区的选民.

sentences.en: Later, he visited his Scottish constituency with his family.
sentences.cn: 之后, 布朗与家人前往他的苏格兰选区访问.

sentences.en: Our constituency covers the city's poorest areas.
sentences.cn: 我们的选区包括该城市最贫困的地区.

sentences.en: The congressman carried out the wishes of his constituency.
sentences.cn: 这国会议员实现了他的选民的愿望.

sentences.en: The magazine changed its format to appeal to a broader constituency.
sentences.cn: 这本杂志为了迎合更广泛读者的口味而改变版式.

sentences.en: Unemployment is high in her constituency.
sentences.cn: 她的选区的失业人数居高不下。

words.tran_cn: （选区的）选民；支持者；（一批）顾客

trans.tran_en: an area of a country that elects a representative to a parliament
